title: Fundamentals of Excel and Analytics
course_learning_outcomes: Analyze business scenarios using linear and quadratic function models
Interpret descriptive statistics to support data-driven business decisions
Model business scenarios using Excel formulas and visualizations
Evaluate relationships between variables using correlation analysis

onboarding_questions.question: Tell me about yourself - what brings you to Fundamentals of Excel and Analytics?
onboarding_questions.placeholder: Your background, current role, and why you want to learn Excel analytics...

onboarding_questions.question: How comfortable are you with Excel?

options.label: Basic - can use simple formulas like SUM and AVERAGE
Intermediate - comfortable with VLOOKUP, pivot tables

onboarding_questions.question: How familiar are you with statistics and data analysis?

options.label: No background - completely new to me
Clear explanations of concepts and methods

onboarding_questions.question: What are you interested in? (This helps me create examples you'll find relevant and engaging)
onboarding_questions.placeholder: e.g., Business analytics, financial modeling, marketing data, sales forecasting, operations management, sports analytics, healthcare data, retail analysis...

onboarding_questions.question: What will you use these analytics skills for?
onboarding_questions.placeholder: e.g., Business reporting, academic research, career advancement, personal projects, data-driven decision making...
